title: JAX-RS method returning TemplateInstance executes on the event loop by default
body:
### Describe the bug

When using  quarkus-resteasy-reactive-qute, any method that returns a TemplateInstance is executed on the event loop thread instead of a worker thread. 

- If I change the method signature to return a String, it is executed on a worker thread.
- If I add `@Blocking` to the Ë›TemplateInstance method, it executes on a worker thread.

### Expected behavior

By default, a non reactive method gets executed on the worker thread

### Actual behavior

The method returning TemplateInstance executes on the event loop.

### How to Reproduce?

- Generate a new quarkus app with qute-reactive on the website
- Add the current thread to one of your pages
- It will be the vertx event loop

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

### Output of `java -version`
